verses.verse: <S%H4100>"How<s%> <S%H3302>beautiful<s%> are your <S%H6471>feet<s%> in <S%H5275>sandals,<s%> O prince's <S%H1323>daughter!<s%> The <S%H2542>curves<s%> of your <S%H3409>hips<s%> are <S%H3644>like<s%> <S%H2481>jewels,<s%> The <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of an <S%H542>artist.<s%>

"Your <S%H8270>navel<s%> is [like] a <S%H5469>round<s%> <S%H101>goblet<s%> Which <S%H408>never<s%> <S%H2637>lacks<s%> <S%H4197>mixed<s%> <S%H4197>wine;<s%> Your <S%H990>belly<s%> is like a <S%H6194>heap<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H5473>Fenced<s%> <S%H5473>about<s%> with <S%H7799>lilies.<s%>

"Your <S%H6677>neck<s%> is like a <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H8127>ivory,<s%> Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> [like] the <S%H1295>pools<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> By the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of Bath-rabbim; Your <S%H639>nose<s%> is like the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> Which <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H6440>toward<s%> <S%H1834>Damascus.<s%>

"Your <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H5921>crowns<s%> you like <S%H3760>Carmel,<s%> And the <S%H9089>flowing<s%> <S%H9089>locks<s%> of your <S%H7218>head<s%> are like <S%H713>purple<s%> <S%H713>threads;<s%> [The] <S%H4428>king<s%> is <S%H631>captivated<s%> by [your] <S%H9547>tresses.<s%>
"Your <S%H6967>stature<s%> is <S%H1819>like<s%> a <S%H8558>palm<s%> <S%H8558>tree,<s%> And your <S%H7699>breasts<s%> are [like its] <S%H811>clusters.<s%>

"I <S%H559>said,<s%> 'I will <S%H5927>climb<s%> the <S%H8558>palm<s%> <S%H8558>tree,<s%> I will <S%H270>take<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> of its <S%H5577>fruit<s%> <S%H5577>stalks.<s%>' <S%H4994>Oh,<s%> <S%H4994>may<s%> your <S%H7699>breasts<s%> be like <S%H811>clusters<s%> of the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> And the <S%H7381>fragrance<s%> of your <S%H639>breath<s%> like <S%H8598>apples,<s%>

And your <S%H2441>mouth<s%> like the <S%H2896>best<s%> <S%H3196>wine!<s%>" "It <S%H1980>goes<s%> [down] <S%H4339>smoothly<s%> for my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> <S%H1680>Flowing<s%> <S%H1680>gently<s%> [through] the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of those <S%H3463>who<s%> <S%H3463>fall<s%> <S%H3463>asleep.<s%>
"I am my beloved's, And his <S%H8669>desire<s%> is for me.
<S%H1980>"Come,<s%> my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> let us <S%H3318>go<s%> out into the <S%H7704>country,<s%> Let us <S%H3885>spend<s%> the <S%H3885>night<s%> in the <S%H3723>villages.<s%>

"Let us <S%H7925>rise<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> [and go] to the <S%H3754>vineyards;<s%> Let us <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> the <S%H1612>vine<s%> has <S%H6524>budded<s%> [And its] <S%H5563>blossoms<s%> have <S%H6605>opened,<s%> [And whether] the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> have <S%H9343>bloomed.<s%> <S%H8033>There<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you my <S%H1730>love.<s%>

"The <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%> have <S%H5414>given<s%> forth <S%H7381>fragrance;<s%> And <S%H5921>over<s%> our <S%H6607>doors<s%> are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4022>choice<s%> [fruits,] Both <S%H2319>new<s%> and <S%H3465>old,<s%> Which I have <S%H6845>saved<s%> up for you, my <S%H1730>beloved.<s%>
